metadata.title: CVE-2016-7951 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Multiple integer overflows in X.org libXtst before 1.2.3 allow remote X servers to trigger out-of-bounds memory access operations by leveraging the lack of range checks.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-7951` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxtst6 - 1.2.3-1
No subscription required

notes.note: sbeattie> same commit as CVE-2016-7952 msalatore> patch released in 2:1.2.2-1+deb8u1

criterions.comment: libxtst package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.3-1').
